string-array.name: intro_descr
string-array.item: AgKit-Mobile is an Android application designed for dynamic control and visualization of the AgKit robot.
Organize how you like with custom configurations.
Enhance your configurations by defining customizable nodes in the Details section.
Monitor the cameras and ROS network. Control the camera angles, LED\'s, and more.
Track AgKit and record its path as is travels.
Directly access AgKit via the embedded SSH terminal.
